items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes and comments instantly across devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by any team member, all other members see the change within 2 seconds.
Comments added to a task are visible to all team members without requiring a page refresh.
non_functional: System should handle at least 500 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Updates should have a latency of less than 2 seconds.

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made include the need for real-time synchronization and multi-device support. Further clarification needed on specific collaboration features (e.g., file sharing, chat).
